Package org.hibernate.engine.jdbc

Interface NClobImplementer

All Superinterfaces:
ClobImplementer
All Known Implementing Classes:
NClobProxy
public interface NClobImplementer extends ClobImplementer
Marker interface for non-contextually created NClob instances.

NClob is a new type introduced in JDK 1.6 (JDBC 4)
